body:
Hi Everyone, 

So basically I have been working on a 16x resource pack mash-up. This pack is mainly for pvp and I would like some feedback before releasing it. It has customized sounds including COD  as a bow sound and some other cool sounds. 
Please give feedback!

http://imgur.com/a/a2lAJ#0

^_^
body_tagged:

title: Feedback Needed for Lazer Pack ^_^

@Crusty Well I called it 16x because basically nearly everything there is 16x.

replies.body: ... Maybe edit the inventory and the hearts ya know? add more detail to the pack, otherwise its gewd :3

replies.body: Nice texture packs :D. The swords are very sexy,I love those types of swords. Blue hearts and blue gapples pls :D
replies.body_tagged: Nice texture packs :D. The swords are very sexy,I love those types of swords. Blue hearts and blue gapples pls :D

replies.body:
Hearts and Inventory GUI haven't finished yet. The hearts are going to be a surprise :)
I will try to make 3 copies of the pack.
1. Normal Swords with COD Sounds
2. Normal Swords with non COD Sounds
3. Longer Swords with COD Sounds

i do liek the armour tho

replies.body: What is the texture based for? Avicus? Or pot pvp? I prefer thick swords in pot pvp. If its avicus keep it at skinny :D
replies.body_tagged: What is the texture based for? Avicus? Or pot pvp? I prefer thick swords in pot pvp. If its avicus keep it at skinny :D

replies.body: Well, I want this texture pack to be pvp optimized so kinda both. But as stated in my reply to killerbye, I will make a thicker and longer sword pack
